title: Lui hnar a awm thisena luang
lyrics:
Lui hnar a awm, thisena luang,
Kalvari-a chhuak chu;
Chu thisen lui, mi sual tak chuan
Faina a hmuhna chu.

Aw, Kalvari lui mawi tak,
Ka tan i lo luang chhuak.

Mi sual th i tur an khenbeh khan,
Faina lui chu a hmu;
Amah tlukin sual
Min tihthianghlim theih chu!

Lalpa duh tak, i thisen hlu,
Tam takin an hre lo;
Chhandamte chuan hei hi an hmu,
An phurrit a lum bo.

Ka rinnain lui chu ka hmu,
A luang ka ram thlengin;
Min hmangaihna ka thupui ber,
Ka thih ni thleng pawhin.
